key.name: oncurrentworkspace
key.description: Opens the Overview when the last Window on the current Workspace is closed

key.name: onlastworkspace
key.description: Opens the Overview even if the current Workspace is the last one

key.name: ignoreminimized
key.description: Opens the Overview even if there are minimized windows on the current Workspace

key.name: onstartup
key.description: Opens the Overview whenever Gnome-Shell is started on an empty desktop

key.name: landingstartup
key.description: The Overview landing page after Shell startup

key.name: landingstandard
key.description: The Overview landing page for standard Workspaces turning empty

key.name: landinglastworkspace
key.description: The Overview landing page for the last Workspace turning empty
